56867.「これは…… 虹色の輝石のペンダント！: This is... a Rainbow Augite pendant!

56868.「……そうですか。これは 父からの……。\n 私が 母と おそろいのペンダントが:
I see... so this is from my father... he
remembered how I told him I wanted matching
pendants with my mother.

56869.「ありがとうございます。<pc>さん。\n 一生の宝物にすると 父に伝えてくださ:
Thank you, <pc>. Please tell my
father that I'll cherish it forever.

56870.「もう二度と 父とは\n 連絡を取ることもないと 思っていましたが\n こうして:
I thought I'd never hear from him again, but
to think that he still remembers me...

56871.「すっかり 切れたと思っていたのに \n 人の縁というものは 不思議なものですね:
I thought he just cut me out of his life.
Relationships are a strange thing, aren't
they...?

56873.「あなたが 父の所から来たということは\n <kyodai>とは もう 再会を果:
If you came from my father's, that means you
must've already met with <kyodai>
and gotten the flowers, right?

56875.「もしや <kyodai>に 会ってないのですか？ \n ……では <kyoda:
You haven't seen <kyodai> yet?
Then... did you get what they entrusted to
my father...?

56876.「……なんと！ 受け取ってないと？\n となると 父が <kyodai>から\n:
...What?! You didn't get them?
Then again... my father may have forgotten
all about it.

56877.「……<pc>さん。 \n 私は この世界で もっとも長く\n あなたの<kyo:
<pc>... I'm the person who spent
the most time with your sibling while they
were still here.

56878.「まさか あなたが <kyodai>と会うより早く\n ここへ来るとは 思いませ:
I never thought you'd get here before them,
but... I'd like to take this opportunity to
tell you the story of our lives.

56879.「６０年ほど前のこと。一流の錬金術師になった\n あの人は エテーネの村の巫女に:
60 years ago, they became a first-rate
alchemist and was asked by a priestess in
Ethene Village to make a certain flower.

56880.「その花作りは 危険をともなうと 巫女から\n 忠告されたそうです。あの人は 私:
The priestess warned them that making those
flowers was dangerous. They left the island in
hopes that we wouldn't be in any danger.

56881.「……しかし 私はそれを見逃さなかったのです。\n <kyodai>から事情を聞:
<kyodai> told me everything, and
I knew it would take an immense amount of
effort to create those flowers...

56882.「父が <kyodai>にゆずった\n ナルビアの家を売り…… 当面の生活費と\:
I sold the house in Nalbia my father gave to
<kyodai>... and we left the island to
make ends meet and continue our research.

56883.「思い切ったことをしたものですが……\n 言えば 父にも 危険がおよぶと思い\n:
It was so sudden... but I had to do it without
telling him. I didn't want to put him in
danger...

56884.「そして 花作りの研究を進めてゆくと\n 巫女の予言通り ひたいにイレズミを入れ:
As we continued researching the flowers, a
man with a strange mark on his forehead came
after us, just as the priestess predicted.

56885.「私たちは あの男が現れるたびに\n 各地を転々としながら 研究を続けたのですが:
We had to keep moving from place to place, but
the man was very persistent and vindictive...

56886.「これ以上 私を巻き添えにできないと判断した\n <kyodai>は 私を この:
<kyodai> decided that they didn't
want me involved any further, so they left me
here for safety and went off on their own...

56887.「本当は 最後まで 一緒にいたかった……。\n ですが <kyodai>の必死な:
I really wanted to stay with them, but...
With the desperate look on their face, I had
no choice but to promise to stay here.

56888.「それ以来…… 私は ここで\n <kyodai>の無事と あの研究が完成し\n:
Since then... I wished them well and made sure
they had all of the research I'd done on
those flowers.

56889.「そんなある日…… １０年ほど前でしたか。 \n ……<kyodai>から 手紙:
Then one day, about 10 years ago...
...I received a letter from <kyodai>.

56890.「そこには 無事に 花が完成したことと\n その花へ至るカギを 私の父 イッショ:
The letter said that they successfully created
the flower and that it was sent to my father,
Issho.

56891.「<kyodai>は あなたを待っているはずです。\n 父の所へ戻ったら <ky:
<kyodai> must be waiting for you.
When you go back to my father, can you ask
if he received anything from them?

56892.「そして…… 私が 勝手にナルビアの家を売り\n くわしい事情を話さずに 島を出:
And... please tell my father that I apologize
for selling the house in Nalbia without asking
and leaving the island without telling him.
